name: Ski-X-Press
description:
Ski-X-Press is a simple reaction game with the goal avoid obstacles while trying to get as far as possible.

I hope you will enjoy this small game! I allways appreciate feedback so feel free to leave a comment. The game is free to download for windows. If you want to support me feel free to donate but dont feel obligated to do so.                                       - MrSliddes

All songs used in this project are made by me using Lmms / Music Maker 2017

I made this game in Gamemaker Studio 2.
